Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4001_09.jpg'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'I\'m sacrificing one of the "Bishop\'s" dice for decisions.'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'The roll is a 5, confirming events from c2 to c6.'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Move the "Knight" to c4, which triggers an event. The "Knight" earns two additional dice.'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Now, it's your turn."}
{3: 'The King gestures for you to proceed, and the round count on the scoreboard jumps from 11 to 12.'}
{3: "It's the twelfth round of the game, the sixth move for both sides."}
{3: 'The 3D chessboard lights up, clearly showing the status of either side.'}
{3: 'The "Bishops" haven\'t moved a step from square one. With the white "Queen" in the lead, the black "Queen" falls a few squares behind.'}
{3: 'Following closely are the white "Knight", then the black "Knight" and a white "Pawn", with a black "Pawn" trailing at the end.'}
{3: 'The white "Queen", "Knight", and the "Pawn" form a tricky blockade, maintaining a lead while preventing the black pieces from advancing to steal dice from the white side.'}
{3: "The white side has more dice, too, and it's probably safe to say that you're only a few rounds away from defeat if you don't do something now."}
{2: 'King', 3: "Heh, what's taking you so long?"}
{2: "What's the rush? We've got time.", 3: '16', 4: "You just can't wait, huh?", 5: '16'}
{3: 'You snap back as your fingers hover aimlessly over the chessboard—something you\'re doing on purpose to wear down the "King\'s" patience.'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'This is a waste of time and you know it. Wanna just give up now?'}
{2: 'Are you saying that because you think I can turn the tables in the next few rounds?', 3: '19', 4: 'Impatience never gets you far, mind you.', 5: '19'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Just trying to show you an easy way out. Humans love saving face, no?'}
{2: 'Well, thanks but no thanks.', 3: '21'}

{3: 'After replying impassively, you pick the "Queen". With the dice, however, you aren\'t so lucky this time—with a roll of "4", you know that the "King" would still be leading even after this round.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: 'α', 3: "You're going to lose.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...What are you talking about?', 3: '32'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Your poker face is quite something.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Your left hand has been shaking. Didn't you notice?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4001_09.jpg'}
{3: 'Holding down your left hand hidden under the table, you feel your palm covered in a fine sweat.'}
{3: 'Looking up, you see that the "King\'s" expression remains unchanged, those crimson eyes of hers reflecting your face.'}
{3: "She smiles, seemingly indifferent to the game's outcome and satisfied just to see you suffer and embarrassed."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory807.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.8'}
{3: "You're not poking fun or trying to play tough. You do feel calm."}
{3: 'Your body is tormented by tension, but your mind races on.'}
{3: "How difficult can this be when it's a game that two kids came up with?"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory819.jpg'}
{3: 'The chessboard follows the size of international chess, totaling 64 squares.'}

{3: 'Not counting the "King" and the specially-functioning "Bishop", each player has four pieces, each with seven dice that, at most, can result in a maximum of 42 moves. The "Queen", on the other hand, has double the mobility, putting its maximum number of moves at 84.'}
{3: "Executing events on the squares grants rewards, and it's also possible to battle and steal the opponent's dice."}
{3: 'Since the number of event squares is fixed, a bit of calculation can reveal the best moves, minimizing the impact of luck.'}
{3: 'Unfortunately, with the game already five rounds in, it hits just now that the game works similarly to tic-tac-toe in that the first move can dictate winning or losing.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'You know what really matters.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Think about "why" instead of "how."'}
{3: 'The "game" itself isn\'t important. What matters is why it takes this form.'}
{3: 'A real "chess player" focuses on things beyond the game itself.'}
{3: 'Beyond the game is probably where the key to victory lies.'}
{3: "This slowly made sense to you through the countless games you've made against a certain fellow player."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4001_09.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.8'}
{3: 'Ridding your mind of all the noises and quickly calming yourself down, you look at the "King" once again in the eye.'}
{2: "Funny how you never speak when it's your turn.", 3: '77'}
{3: 'With it, the "King" slowly lowers her hand that has been hovering over a piece.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory807.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Well, would you fancy a pleasant, friendly chat?', 4: '1'}
{2: "There's no rule against that, is there?", 3: '84', 4: 'Not really asking for "pleasant and friendly."', 5: '84'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Interesting. Is this how you sweet-talked that agent?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Communication can indeed solve many problems.', 3: '89'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Provided it stems from good intentions, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "Is that what you're seeking?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'What if it actually exists?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'If the world had even one bit of goodwill toward her, none of you would be here right now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "You don't understand Luna at all.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Is that so? And do you truly understand your sister, Alpha?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'When she was struggling desperately in a lightless void, did you know what she was really thinking?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Do you really know what her wish is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'So, what do you want?', 3: '103'}
{2: "If you think you're fulfilling your own will, why do you keep mentioning her?", 3: '104'}
{2: "And you're even using her face. Oh, I see how it is now. You're the puppet acting on her behalf, right?", 3: '105'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'You... What did you say?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'This is some sort of plan, right? You said all of that just to upset me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I wish it could be that easy.', 3: '112', 4: 'I can be meaner. Want me to give it a go?', 5: '112'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "The real Ascension-Network wouldn't be as emotionally rich as this.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Do you really think I'm a fake at this point?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "No, but I don't find you particularly special either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "You're just a coward, hiding in a toy house you built and wanting only to play house with people.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'You\'re no "King". You\'re no different from anyone else here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'So, does that mean I should just go ahead and physically eliminate everything here? Would that make you happy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Who\'s twisting kindness? Who lacks any compassion for the weak? Is it you who crave "conflict" or me who seeks "peace"?', 4: '1'}
{2: '...I\'m not going to discuss peace with an "enemy."', 3: '125', 4: 'Do you truly believe you\'re pursuing "peace"?', 5: '125'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'When did I ever say I was your enemy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'You perceive me as the enemy, but am I really?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Why can't we be allies? Why can't this game just be a friendly frolic among friends?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jokes have their limits.', 3: '129', 4: 'I beg to differ.', 5: '129'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Then how do you coexist peacefully with Alpha here? Aren't you enemies?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "If you stand firmly by what you believe, why didn't you just cut each other down the moment you met?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Your attempts at sowing discord are pretty childish.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: '...No, on the contrary, I hope you can get along even better.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What exactly are you trying to achieve with all this?', 3: '136'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Isn't it obvious?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'I\'m filtering the "malice" of this world. I\'m trying to rid the world of it completely.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'King', 3: "I'm trying to get rid of these meaningless conflicts, which would allow those who understand compromise to coexist peacefully. Wouldn't that be a higher form of civilization?", 4: '1'}
{2: "So, that's why you created those white Mental Images...", 3: '141'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "You're just depriving us of the right to choose.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Choice leads to conflict, conflict leads to chaos, and chaos leads to harm. To end all this, coercive measures are necessary.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'This game is a second chance for the transgressors, and I hope they realize how meaningless all these conflicts are.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "If there is a better way to go about this, I'm all ears.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: "Tiny arcs of lightning stir Alpha's hair as pale blue energy slowly courses within her left eye."}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "I don't mind tackling problems head-on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Are you sure you really want to point that sword at me, Alpha?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "You refused to become an agent because you didn't want to be trapped in a dog-eat-dog cage.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Now, I'm showing you new possibilities for filtering, and yet you still stand against this path?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Or is it that you simply don't care about finding answers because you're just too proud to walk with anyone?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Even when that person is your...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The King pauses, before breaking into a smile and falling silent.'}
{2: 'King', 3: "It's your turn, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The round count goes from 13 to 14 as the "King" makes her move.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Did you figure something out?', 3: '173'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Didn't figure much out, but one thing is clear.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "She's not Luna, nor the Ascension-Network.", 4: '1'}
{2: "For now, let's keep playing this game.", 3: '176'}
{2: "Quitting halfway through something isn't how I roll.", 3: '177'}
